#summary Description of support procedures

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= ICAT support procedures=

To protect support calls from spam, people asking for support have to register their google identifier.  Please register the identifier by sending it to Alistair_dot_Mills_at_stfc_dot_ac_dot_uk, where _dot_ has its usual meaning.


To view the record of discussion topics about support, view the following page:

 * https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/icatproject-support 

To email a request for support, use the following email:

 * mailto:icatproject-support@googlegroups.com 

The googlegroups will then register a topic in the discussion group using the subject of the email.

 
== - the end - ==
